wikipedia_page.main: James Lyons Hindmarsh (1885 – 16 March 1959) was an English football player and manager. A half back and inside forward, he played in the Football League for Sunderland, Stockport County and Manchester City. Hindmarsh also played in the Southern League for Fulham, Watford, Plymouth Argyle and Newport County. He went on to manage Newport County for 13 years.
